column4: Could someone please help, my 6.10 won't see my wireless HP kbd or mouse. Or it sees it randomly (after reboot)
is the problem equal with both kbd AND mouse ?
in morning kbd worked fine, I booted to windows, it worked, I booted just to ubuntu and it didn't work
I guess you have to boot into windows now ( to see it does/doesn't work ) :)
I rebooted and usb kbd and mouse are still dead...
so windows also has problem with this wireless gear ?
I asked you to reboot into windows - to see if after the problem occured in ubuntu it is replicated or not in windows.
I rebooted to windows, and no problems
then there needs to be done some tuning.
I know, but what kind of tuning?
look for misc repeat rates, and serial protocols related to usb
